metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0278 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
libuv before 0.10.34 does not properly drop group privileges, which allows context-dependent attackers to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0278` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libuv0.10 - 0.10.28-6ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libuv package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.28-6ubuntu1').
